sentences.sContent: I own a coffee shop in Southern Indiana. I have a room in the back where I spend most of the week.
sentences.sContent_eng: I own a coffee shop in Southern Indiana. I have a room in the back where I spend most of the week.
sentences.sCn: 我在南印第安纳州开了间咖啡屋，咖啡屋后面还有间屋子，我就在那度过一周的大部分时间。

sentences.sContent: I hope we will be able to have a good old-fashioned Lincoln-Douglas debate right here in Indiana, so that you can see for yourself to make the decision about who our next President should be.
sentences.sContent_eng: I hope we will be able to have a good old-fashioned Lincoln-Douglas debate right here in Indiana, so that you can see for yourself to make the decision about who our next President should be.
sentences.sCn: 我希望我们可以在这里，印第安纳州，进行像林肯和道格拉斯那样好的传统性辩论，这样你们就可以为自己做出选择，选出谁应该是我们下一任总统。
